picked_headlines.summary: GFM-RAG uses graphs to enhance LLMs' reasoning, achieving state-of-the-art results.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in enhancing LLMs' reasoning capabilities, crucial for both technical and managerial stakeholders interested in AI development.

picked_headlines.summary: UltraCUA improves computer-use agents by integrating GUI actions, boosting efficiency.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a practical engineering advancement, showcasing improvements in computer-use agents that are relevant to product development and engineering teams.

digest:
- *T-SKM-Net* integrates SKM methods into neural networks for efficient constraint satisfaction, achieving significant speedup and maintaining accuracy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.10461)
- *Cross-modal Retrieval Models* for binary code retrieval achieve state-of-the-art performance in software security tasks. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.10393)
- *PaTAS* introduces a framework for trust propagation in neural networks, enhancing reliability assessment in AI systems under uncertainty. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.20586)
- *RLPA framework* enhances LLMs for personalized dialogue by dynamically modeling user profiles, outperforming existing methods. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.15456)
- *SWEnergy* study reveals inefficiencies in agentic frameworks using SLMs, suggesting new architectures are needed for energy efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.09543)
- *SyGra* is a framework for scalable synthetic data generation, enhancing quality tagging for LLM training with minimal manual effort. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.15432)
- *Graph Neural Network* framework enhances threat detection in IAM logs, outperforming traditional methods in cloud security. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.10280)
- *A Privacy-Preserving Cloud Architecture* integrates federated learning and differential privacy, ensuring compliance and security in distributed ML. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.10341)
- *Clustered Federated Learning* with hierarchical knowledge distillation improves model accuracy and efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.10443)
- *PlanetServe* proposes a decentralized overlay for scalable LLM serving, addressing key challenges in privacy and resource efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20101)
